text: [Music]
hello I'm Omar a cloud Support Engineer
here at the AWS office in Bangalore
India today I'll be showing you how to
grant full access permissions to another
user in work mail let's get started
as you can see I'm already logged into
the AWS management console open Amazon
work mail console
choose your work mail organization
open the user details page for the user
whose mailbox you want to share under
permissions tab choose add or remove
select the users or groups to whom you
want to grant the mailbox permissions
and choose the next button to add them
choose save on the next page for
permissions select full acess choose
save the user can now access shared
mailbox via webmail or added as an
additional mailbox in Outlook profile
for example the user can open the shared
mailbox using the Amazon birth mail web
application by following these steps log
in to the Amazon Berk mail web
application
as you can see I'm already logged in
choose the mail icon choose open the
other inbox option
and then enter the owner of the inbox to
open for folder type choose inbox
choose show subfolders then okay
the shared mail folders are now visible
in the navigation pen thanks for
watching and happy cloud computing from
all of us here at AWS
you
